document_data.name: Grayth Holmfast
document_data.Description: Grayth had silvery-gray hair (once dark) in a close-cropped fringe with a receding hairline and a gray goatee. He was of lean build, although he used to be athletic. He was tall with square shoulders. He spoke with a deep, gravelly voice.
document_data.Relatives: Grayth was married for a time, although was no longer married as of [[Alturiak]], [[1374 DR]]. His two sons of ten and seven years resided with their mother.
document_data.Equipment: Grayth wore a suit of light gold mail underneath a white coat with the sunrise symbol of Lathander. He carried a [[broadsword]].{{cite book/Forsaken House|217}}
document_data.History:
Grayth took part in King [[Azoun IV|Azoun]]'s crusade against the [[Tuigan Horde]] in [[Thesk]].

On [[Tarsakh 7]], [[1374 DR]], Grayth was stabbed in the neck by [[Nurthel Floshin]] in retribution for [[Araevin Teshurr]]'s refusal to cooperate with [[Sarya Dlardrageth]].
